https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lKO2zwq0E93aKpdwzK171W3Lqlt.jpg The wife's friend fills in for the wife on lonely nights! Hyun-joo quits her job and gets kicked out of the house she can't pay for. In the end, she stays at Hye-jin's while she looks for a job. An Affair: My Wife's Friend
